New Records: Gous-Harmeet Singh and Andries Gous recorded the second highest partnership for the sixth wicket in all T20Is
Key Match Events: South Africa won the match by 18 runs
Kagiso Rabada struck important wickets and maintained pace accuracy
USA bowlers conceded 148 runs in 12 overs, with several key bowlers contributing
Steven Taylor and Corey Anderson played impactful roles in the chase
Quinton de Kock scored his highest score of the tournament, 74 runs
Pre-Game Insights: USA bowled first with Aaron Jones captaining due to Monank Patel's injury
South Africa opted to play two spinners, leaving out Ottneil Baartman
The match was played on a batter-friendly surface in Antigua
Post-Match Reflections: Anil Kumble and Andy Flower provided analysis post-match
USA showed discipline and skill despite the loss
South Africa's performance was praised, especially their batting and pace attack
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was the 41st of the Super Eights stage
USA had shown resilience and potential in the tournament
South Africa's women's team was also in action against India in an ODI
Others: The match was part of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024
South Africa's women's team's ODI match against India was mentioned as a separate event
